segments.text: So , Monica , how do you like your new office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I love it . The room is spacious and clean with big windows and a lot of sunshine . There are plants along the corridor . Especially , I got my own desk with computer and telephone . Such a great place !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s very good . I once turn down a job offer just because the office is awful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What was so bad about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Small rooms , small window , a small desk shared by three people . I would have been interrupted all the time and for sure not be able to deliver good work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds bad ! Lucky you ! You didn ’ t take that job . I think a good office environment is also important to work efficiently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Totally agree . By the way , the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506 . You can pick up your office supplies from the supply room at the end of the corridor .
segments.speaker: S1
